::Squizzy::

Squizzy walks up to her room, pressing a button to open the door. It 
was fairly roomy, with a bed on one end, some computers and a desk on 
the other, and some furnishings inbetween. A food proccessor was 
installed near the bed.

"Here you are." She says to Vamprah. "Make yourself at home. I gotta 
get back to the lab."
